title: New address should default to the US
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to add an address to an agents profile
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN clicks add address in an Agent's profile
custom_expected:
THEN form should default to USA
AND zipcode field should display (Same with Canada and US territories)

title: Add International address
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to add an international address to an agents profile
AND [C72682]
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a country other than US
custom_expected: THEN fields/dropdowns should display differently depending on which country

title: List agents that were unable to be mapped
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view the Agents that were unable to be mapped in the spreadsheet upload
custom_steps:
WHEN the user imports a spreadsheet
AND has Agents that were unable to be mapped (duplicates, errors, formatting)
AND clicks continue in the confirmation message
custom_expected: THEN the user receives a list of agents the need further attention

title: BOC Agent UID
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to see the Agent's UID from spreadsheet import and NOT the ebis ID
custom_steps:
WHEN the user completes a spreadsheet upload
AND clicks Agent ID in an Agent profile
custom_expected:
THEN the Agent UID matches the spreadsheet import
AND the field is editable and only accepts numeric values

title: Remove secondary Agent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player has a secondary Agent
AND that Agent has switched agencies
custom_steps:
WHEN the user lists a different agency under the agent
AND user clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN the Agent profile should load in view mode
AND secondary Agent should be removed from player's profile

title: Confirm corresponding profiles (Agent)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to confirm the mapping of Agent ID's w/corresponding Agent profiles
custom_steps: WHEN the user imports a valid spreadsheet
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a dropdown with all active Agents listed alphabetically
AND an "exclude from export" option (default)
AND a 'New Agent' option

title: BOC Create new profile corresponding to spreadsheet (Agent)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants an Agent's profile to be automatically created from the spreadsheet upload
AND has uploaded a valid spreadsheet with new agents
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects 'new agent' from the dropdown
AND clicks 'next'
custom_expected:
THEN The agent's information should match what was in the spreadsheet
AND The agent's UID should match the UID found in the spreadsheet
AND The agent should be Active and appear in the Agents widget and any relevant Agent dropdowns

title: Close Agent profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to close an Agent's profile
AND is in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the close button in an Agent's profile
custom_expected:
THEN the Agent's profile will close
AND user will be returned to entry point

title: Existing Agent profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants the system to remember a newly imported Agent ID for an Agent that already exists
custom_steps:
WHEN the user uploads a spreadsheet
AND has a new agent ID
AND selects an already existing agent
custom_expected:
THEN the system overwrites exist Agent ID
AND remembers ID for future imports

title: BOC Agency ID
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to see the agency ID from spreadsheet import and NOT ebis1
custom_steps:
WHEN the user completes a spreadsheet upload
AND clicks Agency ID in an Agency profile
custom_expected:
THEN the agency ID matches that in the spreadsheet
AND the field is editable and only accepts numeric values

title: Confirm corresponding profiles (Agency)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to confirm the mapping of Agency ID's w/corresponding profiles
custom_steps: WHEN the user imports a spreadsheet
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a dropdown with Agencies listed alphabetically
AND "exclude from export" option (default)
AND 'New Agency' option

title: Close Agency profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to close an Agencies profile
AND is in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the close button in an agency profile
custom_expected:
THEN the agencies profile will close
AND user is returned to the point of entry

title: Existing Agency profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants the system to remember a newly imported Agency ID for an Agency that already exists
custom_steps:
WHEN the user uploads a spreadsheet
AND has a new agency ID
AND selects an already existing agency
custom_expected:
THEN the system overwrites exist Agency ID
AND remembers for future imports

title: BOC Rules check no errors
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is editing the award entry utility
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks save
AND there are no errors
custom_expected:
THEN data is saved and a blue notification displays.
AND page reloads to view mode.

title: BOC Rules check errors
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is editing the award entry utility
AND there are required fields left blank
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN an error message appears with the fields that require action
AND the fields with errors are outlined in red

title: BOC cancel changes made
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user clicks edit on the Award entry utility 
AND has made some changes
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'Cancel'
custom_expected:
THEN message appears
IF user selects 'yes' utility reloads in view mode with no changes are saved
IF user selects 'no' message closes and user returns to utility in edit mode showing their previous changes made

title: Permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN only certain user's can view/edit the award entry utility
AND these are the user's who can edit: LRD Admin
AND these are the user's who can view: BOC Basic and LRD Admin
AND no other users can view/edit unless given permission
custom_steps:
WHEN a user logs in to an account with permissions to view/edit
OR a user logs in to an account with view permissions
OR a user logs in with no permissions
custom_expected:
THEN the award entry utility should only be editable to the proper users
AND the award entry utility should only be viewable to the proper users
AND the award entry utility should not viewable anywhere in the system to users with no permissions

title: Add New Year
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants a new year to be added to the award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN a new year starts
custom_expected:
THEN a new year is added to the award entry utility
AND it can be selected
AND awards can be added to that year

title: BOC receives error if all required fields are not filled in
custom_preconds:
Given the BOC user has navigated to the Award Entry Utility 
AND is added a player to the award
custom_steps:
WHEN the user leaves one of the required fields blank 
AND clicks SAVE
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive and error message that required fields need to be filled in

title: BOC receives error if formatting of fields is incorrect
custom_preconds:
Given the BOC user has navigated to the Award Entry Utility 
AND has added a player to the award
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a non-numerical value in the "Votes/Points" field
AND clicks SAVE
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive and error message stating "You have entered an invalid value in the Votes/Points field. Please enter a whole number."

title: Delete Preliminary Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a preliminary contract exists for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the delete button in edit or view mode in a that contract
custom_expected:
THEN user gets a confirmation message
AND it is not searchable in the system

title: Close Major Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks close
custom_expected: THEN user is returned to point of entry

title: Errors and Warnings
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view the errors and warnings contained in a contract
custom_steps:
WHEN the user updates or saves the contract
AND it contains errors
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a rules check
AND the user receives an error message
AND user is shown what fields need attention in red

title: Consistent Error Messaging
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to see the same kind of error messaging throughout the entire system
AND is committing both hard errors and NOT hard errors
custom_steps: WHEN the user submits any kind of form
custom_expected: THEN the same kind of error message appears across the board

title: View Payment Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to view a player's payments tab
AND is viewing a player's contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the payment tab
custom_expected:
THEN payments tab will load
AND display deferred payments by default

title: Edit Payment Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to edit a contracts payments tab
AND the contract is in a terms confirmed state or higher
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the edit button on the payments tab
custom_expected: THEN the page will reload with editable fields

title: View Payment Defaults
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to view a player's payments tab
AND is viewing a player's contract
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the payments tab
AND there are no deferred payments
custom_expected:
THEN "Contract has no deferred payments" should display
AND First day of current month should display in the "as of" date box
AND rate found in system values should display in "discount rate" field

title: Populate Payment Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants the payment tab to populate
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the save button on a contract
custom_expected: THEN the payment tab should populate

title: Deferred payments
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing the payments tab of a contract
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a different option from the dropdowns
AND clicks view
custom_expected: THEN page refreshes with proper filters implemented

title: View payment by date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to search for a payment by date
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a date in the 'as of' section
AND clicks view
custom_expected:
THEN list filters correct dates
AND correctly filters other dropdowns

title: Discount rate
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view the payment tab based on the discount rate
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a value in the discount rate field
AND clicks 'View' button
custom_expected: THEN the page reloads with correct filtering

title: User unable to enter invalid criteria
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has entered invalid data into any of the fields in the payment tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks view
custom_expected: THEN an error message pops up

title: Add Payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to add a payment to a player's pay schedule
AND is in the payment tab
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the add row button on the pay schedule
custom_expected:
THEN another row will be added to the pay schedule
AND users cannot see the add payment button in view mode

title: Remove Payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to remove a payment from a player's pay schedule
AND is in the payments tab
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the trash icon next to a payment
custom_expected:
THEN the payment row is removed from the pay schedule
AND users cannot see the trash icon in view mode

title: Player history update Terms Confirmed
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants the player's history to update with the current state of their contract
custom_steps: WHEN the player's contract is in a Terms Confirmed or Pending Approval Terms Confirmed state
custom_expected:
THEN the player's history will be updated with signing date
AND The description will be formatted correctly in green font
AND clicking the description will bring you to the contract
AND From Org is the signing org
AND the To Org is blank

title: Player History Approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants the player's history to be updated depending on contract state
custom_steps: WHEN the contract is approved
custom_expected: THEN Description is in correct format in black font

title: Spreadsheet upload
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the LRD wants to upload a Player/Agent spreadsheet
AND the user selects the "Import Spreadsheet" button from the Agent widget
custom_steps:
WHEN the file browser opens accepting only correct file types
AND the user selects a file
AND the spreadsheet has no errors
custom_expected:
THEN a loading indicator appears
AND system runs a rules check
AND window closes

title: Receive confirmation results
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to see the number of Agent/Agencies updated and those that still need action
custom_steps:
WHEN a user imports a valid spreadsheet without any errors
AND there are entries that need to be updated
custom_expected: THEN they receive a 'results' message showing which uploads were successful and which need further action

title: Invalid file type
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to be notified if they upload an invalid file type
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to upload an invalid file
custom_expected: THEN the system only allows user to select valid filetypes

title: Error notifications in Agent/Agency speadsheet upload
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to be notified of any errors in the upload spreadsheet (required fields, valid format)
custom_steps: WHEN a user uploads a spreadsheet with errors
custom_expected:
THEN system does not upload the file
AND notifies user of the errors

title: Receive confirmation
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to see the number of Agent/Agencies updated
custom_steps: WHEN a user imports a valid spreadsheet without any errors
custom_expected: THEN they receive a blue 'confirmation' message showing which uploads were successful

title: Update Agent contact info
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants the mapping spreadsheet to update Agents' contact info
AND has uploaded a valid spreadsheet without any errors
custom_steps:
WHEN the system runs a rules check
AND processes spreadsheet row by row
custom_expected: THEN Agent's contact info in profile will be updated with what was contained in the spreadsheet

title: Update Agent's info (duplicate entry)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to use a mapping spreadsheet to update an Agent's contact info
AND has imported a spreadsheet with duplicate entries
custom_steps:
WHEN the system runs its rules check
AND processes each row in the spreadsheet
IF there are duplicate entries for the same agent
custom_expected:
THEN first entry will be recognized and not anything after
AND Agent's profile info will be updated with spreadsheet's first entry

title: Update Agent's info (mismatching Agency)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to use a mapping spreadsheet to update Agent's info
AND has imported a spreadsheet with a different Agency then on the Agent's profile
custom_steps:
WHEN the system runs a rules check
AND processes each row
IF there is an agent ID with a different Agency than that listed in their profile
custom_expected: THEN that agent will NOT be updated

title: Update Agent's info (wrong name)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to use a mapping spreadsheet to update an Agent's info
AND the spreadsheet contains a different name associated with the ID
custom_steps:
WHEN the system runs a rules check
AND processes each row
IF there is a different name for an Agent's ID
custom_expected:
THEN the system will default to the name already used in the system
AND Agent's info will be updated
